00076 void DockWidget::leaveEvent(QEvent*)
00077 {
00078     if (!_d->dockButton) {
00079         _d->dockButton = _d->dockBar->buttonForDock(this);
00080     }
00081 
00082     if (_d->dockButton && _d->dockButton->isAutoHide()) {
00083         emit mouseLeave();
00084     }
00085 }
